sources.title: Escape and Evasion | Full War Drama Movie | Rena Owen
sources.description:
Escape and Evasion follows a soldier who returns home in search of solace after his men are killed in Burma.
2019.  Stars: Rena Owen, Hugh Sheridan, Firass Dirani

metadata.Plot: After his men are killed in Burma. A lone soldier returns home in search of solace. Hiding a dark secret and confronted by an unrelenting journalist, he's forced to face the ghosts of his past one last time.
metadata.Actors: Rena Owen, Hugh Sheridan, Firass Dirani
